title: Bridging the Gap from Dev to Ops: Managing Your Infrastructure with PowerShell
description: VMs, containers, micro-servicesâ€”what do they all have in common? They all run on infrastructure. Struggling to bring the Ops into your DevOps framework? PowerShell can be a powerful mechanism to start managing your infrastructure while bridging the gap between Dev and Ops. No matter which side of the equation you sit on, this example-heavy session will get you started using PowerShell to more effectively manage your environment.
